suggestions.original: To improve the deformation dimension in the artwork, consider refining the transitions between the exaggerated and normal proportions. For instance, ensure that the elongated limbs and necks blend more seamlessly with the rest of the body to avoid a disjointed appearance. Additionally, maintaining consistent deformation across all characters can enhance the overall cohesiveness. Experimenting with varying degrees of deformation in different parts of the characters, such as slightly less exaggerated necks and more pronounced limb elongation, might also create a more balanced and engaging visual effect.
suggestions.current: Please use Egyptian frontal painting to review.
